name: Pong Game (VISHANT BHARDWAJ)
description:
This is a advanced version of a pong game with really nice music sound effect.

How to play

Pong is a table tennis-themed two-dimensional arcade game. The user moves an in-game paddle vertically across the left or right side of the screen to control it. They can battle against another player on the other side who controls a second paddle. The paddles are used to strike the ball back and forth.

History of pong

Pong game was first release on 29 November 1972 by American company Atari. pong game was very much successful at that time
